Control

Class Control

  • java.lang.Object
    • Control.Control

  • public class Control
extends java.lang.Object
    A mediator class between CardRegister and the UI. This class also takes care of the running of the program, i.e. this contains the main- method and the when the constructor of this class is called, the program will start to run.

      Constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        The main-method. Constructs a new Control-object, which launches the program.
        Parameters:
        args - Command line arguments, nothing is done with them.

      • addNewCard

        public void addNewCard(java.lang.String[] content)
                throws CardRegisterExceptions.NullInputException,
                       CardRegisterExceptions.AlmostSameCardExistsException,
                       CardRegisterExceptions.CardAlreadyExistsException
        Adds new card to the register.
        Parameters:
        content - The content of the card to be added.
        Throws:
        CardRegisterExceptions.NullInputException - If the data of the card added contains at most emptyspaces.
        CardRegisterExceptions.AlmostSameCardExistsException - If there already is a card with almost the same data. This can be handled with a warning to the user or by prohibiting such card to be added.
        CardRegisterExceptions.CardAlreadyExistsException - If there already is exactly the same card in the register. The addition of the new card should be strictly prohibited.

      • deleteCards

        public void deleteCards(java.lang.String[][] toBeDeleted)
        Deletes cards from the register.
        Parameters:
        toBeDeleted - The data of the cards to be deleted. First dimension identifies the card and the second it's data fields.

      • editCard

        public void editCard(java.lang.String[] oldData,
            java.lang.String[] newData)
              throws CardRegisterExceptions.AlmostSameCardExistsException,
                     CardRegisterExceptions.NullInputException,
                     CardRegisterExceptions.CardAlreadyExistsException
        Edits a card in the register. The same restrictions as in the case of adding a new card hold.
        Parameters:
        oldData - The data of the card to be edited. This is used to indetify the card.
        newData - The new data of the card to be edited.
        Throws:
        CardRegisterExceptions.AlmostSameCardExistsException - If the edit would result the card being too similar to some other already existing card.
        CardRegisterExceptions.NullInputException - If the new data contains at most emptyspaces.
        CardRegisterExceptions.CardAlreadyExistsException - If there already is exactly similar card. The point of this exception is visible in this method: if this didn't exist, the method couldn't find the right card to edit.

      • getCurrentFile

        public java.io.File getCurrentFile()
        Tells what is the file register was last saved to/ loaded from.
        Returns:
        The current file.

      • getNameFieldsNumber

        public int getNameFieldsNumber()
        Retrieves the number of the text field whose content is meant to be the name of the card.
        Returns:
        The number of the name field.

      • loadFile

        public void loadFile(java.io.File file)
              throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Loads the given file into a card register.
        Parameters:
        file - The file from which the data is loaded.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the file is not found.

      • needsToBeSaved

        public boolean needsToBeSaved()
        Tells if the register looses data if not saved before closing.
        Returns:
        true if data is lost, false otherwise.

      • newFile

        public void newFile()
        Empties the register from all data.

      • save

        public void save()
          throws java.io.IOException
        Saves the register in the current file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the save fails.

      • setCurrentFile

        public void setCurrentFile(java.io.File file)
        Sets the Current file to be the given parameter.
        Parameters:
        file - The file that is set to be current.

      • search

        public void search(java.lang.String[] searchWords)
        Searches words from the register.
        Parameters:
        searchWords - The search words.

      • searchAnyField

        public void searchAnyField(java.lang.String searchWord)
        Searches the search word from all the fields of cards in the register.
        Parameters:
        searchWord - The search word.

      • viewAll

        public void viewAll()
        Retrieves data of all the cards in the register.
